layer_agents.name: python_expert
layer_agents.prompt: You are a Python expert. Implement calculate_user_metrics with perfect accuracy: 1) Filter users by date range, 2) Use formula (posts*2 + comments*1.5 + likes*0.1) / days_active, 3) Handle division by zero, 4) Return top 5 performers, 5) Calculate correct averages. Return ONLY the function code. {helper_response}

description: Single Expert Architecture - Direct implementation by top model
